title: Electrical Grid Stability Simulated Data Data Set
description: The local stability analysis of the 4-node star system (electricity producer is in the center) implementing Decentral Smart Grid Control concept.

target.name: stabf
target.description: the stability label of the system : stable or unstable

features.name: tau1
features.description: reaction time of participant (real from the range [0.5,10]s). Tau1 - the value for electricity producer.

features.name: tau2
features.description: reaction time of participant (real from the range [0.5,10]s). Tau1 - the value for electricity producer.

features.name: tau3
features.description: reaction time of participant (real from the range [0.5,10]s). Tau1 - the value for electricity producer.

features.name: tau4
features.description: reaction time of participant (real from the range [0.5,10]s). Tau1 - the value for electricity producer.

features.name: p1
features.description: nominal power consumed(negative)/produced(positive)(real). For consumers from the range [-0.5,-2]s^-2; p1 = abs(p2 + p3 + p4)

features.name: p2
features.description: nominal power consumed(negative)/produced(positive)(real). For consumers from the range [-0.5,-2]s^-2; p1 = abs(p2 + p3 + p4)

features.name: p3
features.description: nominal power consumed(negative)/produced(positive)(real). For consumers from the range [-0.5,-2]s^-2; p1 = abs(p2 + p3 + p4)

features.name: p4
features.description: nominal power consumed(negative)/produced(positive)(real). For consumers from the range [-0.5,-2]s^-2; p1 = abs(p2 + p3 + p4)

features.name: g1
features.description: coefficient (gamma) proportional to price elasticity (real from the range [0.05,1]s^-1). g1 - the value for electricity producer.

features.name: g2
features.description: coefficient (gamma) proportional to price elasticity (real from the range [0.05,1]s^-1). g1 - the value for electricity producer.

features.name: g3
features.description: coefficient (gamma) proportional to price elasticity (real from the range [0.05,1]s^-1). g1 - the value for electricity producer.

features.name: g4
features.description: coefficient (gamma) proportional to price elasticity (real from the range [0.05,1]s^-1). g1 - the value for electricity producer.
